ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] testing
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe they can.  I think I almost went with Tunare, but decided on Erollisi Marr, as it made more sense for a bard to worship to Goddess of Love than the
ygData.messageBody:
I believe they can. I think I almost went with Tunare, but decided on Erollisi Marr, as it made more sense for a bard to worship to Goddess of Love than the Goddess of Nature. Most usually are agnostic, though, but where's the challenging fun in that. :)

Willowlark Stormsynger
21st Bardess
Karana Server
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 6:53 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] testing


can bards worship Tunare? all the quest items i have seen so far from PoG
have been for Tunare worshippers only.

Shada, 58 Bard
